data.title: Sarah Michelle Gellar
data.meta_description: Celebrity gossip, Hollywood rumors, and entertainment news. Join us as as break down the juiciest rumors on the biggest celebrities.
data.text:
Sarah Michelle Gellar’s Husband Does All the Cooking

Sarah Michelle Gellar would starve if not for her husband's cooking.

The Buffy the Vampire Slayer actress admits her spouse of 11 years Freddie Prinze Jr. prepares the majority of the meals at home and he even enlists their daughter Charlotte Grace, four, to give a helping hand in the kitchen.

"I have my husband who is so incredibly hands-on. Thank God he can cook or I would probably never eat. We try to make [everything] a family thing, so we'll go to the farmer's market and Charlotte can pick out a piece of fish. And she and Freddie will go to the grill and she pretends to light her little grill."

The 36-year-old starlet, who gave birth to her second child Rocky in 2012, admits it can be tough being a working parent, but says Freddie, 37, and her own mother give her incredible support which has allowed her to return to work on new sitcom The Crazy Ones: "Working with one child was one thing, but working with two is entirely different. I had both my kids' birthdays, they turned four and one in a span of 24 hours, and we moved, and we launched the show."

Sarah Michelle Gellar Reveals Son’s Name

Sarah Michelle Gellar has finally revealed her three-month-old baby boy's name is Rocky James.

The Buffy the Vampire Slayer actress and her husband Freddie Prinze Jr. welcomed their second child - a brother for three-year-old daughter Charlotte Grace - in September but kept their son's name a closely guarded secret until now. A source close to the 35-year-old actress confirmed the news to USMagazine.com and explained that "James" is Freddie and his late father's middle name but gave no explanation for his first name.

Sarah and Freddie, 36, - who have been married for 10 years - were said to have been hoping for a baby boy earlier this year and were glad when a scan proved that to be the case. "Sarah was secretly hoping for a boy. She realizes this will most likely be the last baby she has, so she's so happy she'll have the experience of raising one of each," a source said.

The pair first met on the set of 1997 horror movie I Know What You Did Last Summer, and close friends have claimed they prefer family time to working. "They both came of age in Hollywood and love working, but their home life is important to them," an insider added.

Sarah Michelle Gellar Gives Birth

Sarah Michelle Gellar has given birth to a baby boy.

The Buffy the Vampire Slayer actress and her husband Freddie Prinze Jr. welcomed their second child - a brother for three-year-old daughter Charlotte Grace - last week, and both mother and baby are doing well.

"Sarah Michelle and Freddie Prinze Jr are thrilled to announce that they welcomed a baby son into the world this past week. Mother and baby are doing great. And Charlotte is very excited to be a big sister," a representative told Us Weekly.

A name for the baby is not yet known.

Sarah and Freddie - who have been married for 10 years - were said to have been hoping for a baby boy earlier this year and were glad when a scan proved that to be the case. "Sarah was secretly hoping for a boy. She realizes this will most likely be the last baby she has, so she's so happy she'll have the experience of raising one of each," a source previously said.

Sarah Michelle Gellar Expecting a Boy

Sarah Michelle Gellar is expecting a boy.

The 35-year-old actress and her husband of nearly 10 years, Freddie Prinze Jr. - who have a two-year-old daughter Charlotte - are said to have been "secretly hoping" to have a son to give Charlotte a brother, so they are delighted with the news.

"Sarah was secretly hoping for a boy. She realizes this will most likely be the last baby she has, so she's so happy she'll have the experience of raising one of each," a source told Star.

Freddie, 36, is said to be "incredibly" excited that the couple - who met on the set of 1997 horror film I Know What You Did Last Summer and started dating three years later - are expecting a boy, and he "can't wait" to teach his son how to play various sports.

"Freddie is incredibly pumped it's a boy. He can't wait to coach him in sports when he's older," the source added.

Sarah Michelle Gellar Expecting Second Child?

Sarah Michelle Gellar and husband Freddie Prinze, Jr. are expecting their second child.

The couple - who met on the set of 1997 horror film I Know What You Did Last Summer and started dating three years later - have reportedly decided to give daughter Charlotte Grace, two, a little brother or sister.

"She and Freddie are thrilled. They're amazing parents," a source told US Weekly.

The actors tied the knot in Mexico in September 2002, and admit they often fight about who gets to stay at home with their little girl, and who has to go to work. Sarah, 35, who recently returned to the screen in drama series Ringer, said, "We fight over who gets to stay home. You'd think it would be the opposite, that the parents would be like, 'No, I'll go to work!' but he's like, 'You stayed home for two years! It's my turn!' He and Charlotte have too much fun. I'm jealous!"

Hollywood Baby Roundup: September 22, 2009

It’s time once again to congratulate those celebrities entering into parenthood:

Jenna Elfman: Life is imitating art for the Accidentally on Purpose star. Elfman, who plays a mother-to-be on her new CBS comedy, is now anticipating a baby off-camera. “My character is pregnant the whole first season, so I said it’s a good time to have another baby because we won’t have to hide it,” she explained. Jenna and her husband, Bodhi Elfman, are already parents to a 2-year-old boy.

Hollywood Baby Roundup: April 23, 2009

It’s time once again to congratulate those celebrities entering into parenthood:

Ellen Pompeo: Will there soon be a McBaby on Grey’s Anatomy? Just a few months ago, actress Chyler Leigh (Lexie Grey) confirmed her pregnancy. Now her TV sister is expecting as well. Pompeo and her husband, Chris Ivery, have been married since November 2007. This will be their first child.

Jill Scott: The No. 1 Ladies’ Detective Agency star and singer just added “mother” to her resume. Scott and her fiance, musician Lil John Roberts, became first-time parents to a baby boy on Monday. Scott learned she was pregnant with Jett Hamilton Roberts the day she was supposed fly to Botswana for her new HBO series.

Click to continue reading Hollywood Baby Roundup: April 23, 2009
